title: ECHOES Focus Group on Intangible Heritage Communities
content: ECHOES Focus Group on Intangible Heritage Communities The ECHOES project organised a virtual Focus Group on Intangible Cultural Heritage Institutions in collaboration with CLARIN on 19 January 2026.    After a brief introduction to the Cultural Heritage Cloud by Rémi Petitcol, as well as CLARIN’s work on Intangible Cultural Heritage by Francesca Frontini, the session featured two keynote presentations:  Insights from the PlaceMUS XR project, which develops digital tools for the EC...
creator: Elisa Gorgaini
sourceDescription: Common Language Resources and Technology Infrastructure
